Christian Hadinata

Indonesian Badminton legend as player, coach and comittee

Christian play Men's double and Mixed double. He coached Indonesian Men's double category and becomes a comitte of PBSI

Here's a time line of Christian Hadinata's life:

  • 1949- Born in Purwokerto, Central Java
  • 1965- Start to play Badminton in Mutiara Club
  • 1971- Winning national championships men's doubles with Atik Jauhari, Winning Asian Championships mixed doubles with Retno Kustijah
  • 1972- Winning All England men's doubles with Ade Chandra
  • 1980- Winning World Championships, Denmark Open men's doubles with Ade Chandra, Winning World Championships mixed doubles with Imelda Wiguno

“Success isn't always about greatness. It's about consistency. Consistent Hard Work leads to Success. Greatness will come”

-- Dwayne "The Rock" Jonshon --

If you have time, you should read more about this incredible human being on his Wikipedia entry
